item.title: Hot Springs Logging Yard (Arkansas) v1.0 1.54 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 27, 2025

Hot Springs Logging Yard (Arkansas) v1.0 1.54 ATS

This logging yard is located on a stretch of curvy paved road with a logging road located behind the purchasable property that leads to a logging job site to pick up loads from.

This yard includes repair, sleep, fuel and garage triggers.
Location: Hot Springs, Arkansas. Buy garage to get started!

Credits: MattVT

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Volvo FH 2024 AERO v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 27, 2025

Volvo FH 2024 AERO v1.0 ETS2

You’re in luck! The Volvo FH Aero is officially in Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2). SCS Software, the developers, released it as a free update.

Here’s what you need to know about the Volvo FH 2024 Aero in ETS2:
Official Release: The Volvo FH Series 6, which includes the new Volvo FH16 Aero and FH Aero with I-Save, was officially released into Euro Truck Simulator 2 on December 17, 2024, as part of game update 1.53. This was a significant and highly anticipated addition by SCS Software.

Key Features (Official Version):
Aerodynamic Design: The main highlight is the longer, more aerodynamic front section, designed for improved fuel efficiency in real life, and faithfully recreated in-game.
New Engine Options: This includes the powerful 780 HP D16 engine, making it the most powerful truck in the game (as of its release).
Cabin Variants: Available in various cabin types, including Sleeper, Globetrotter, Globetrotter XL, and Globetrotter XXL, all with an Aero variant option.
Chassis Configurations: Multiple chassis options (4×2, 6×2, 6×4, 8×4).
Customization: A good range of customization options for grilles, bumpers, paint jobs, and interior trims (FH16, FH Dynamic, FH Progressive, and FH Robust).
Digital Camera Mirror System: A notable feature is the option to use the modern digital camera mirror system instead of traditional mirrors, providing a different perspective.
Realistic Sounds: SCS Software recorded sounds directly from the real trucks for an authentic experience.

How to Get It: Since it’s an official addition, you just need to ensure your Euro Truck Simulator 2 game is updated to version 1.53 or later. The Volvo FH Aero (FH Series 6) will then be available at the Volvo truck dealer in the game.

Complementary to FH Series 5: Alongside the FH Series 6 (Aero), SCS also introduced the Volvo FH Series 5 (the non-Aero, but still new-generation FH) in the same update, giving players a full range of modern Volvo FH trucks.

Modding Community: While the official version is excellent, the modding community will undoubtedly continue to create additional tuning packs, accessories, skins, and possibly even standalone versions with unique features for the Volvo FH Aero, expanding customization even further. You might find “painted parts” mods or “reworked” mods that add even more specific details or options.

So, you don’t need a mod to experience the Volvo FH Aero 2024 in ETS2 anymore! Just update your game and head to your nearest Volvo dealership.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Basculante Estrada Dolly 2025 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 27, 2025

Basculante Estrada Dolly 2025 v1.0 ETS2

You’re asking about a “Basculante Estrada Dolly 2025” for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2). This sounds like a specific type of dump trailer (basculante) that uses a dolly to connect to the truck, and you’re looking for a very recent or futuristic version (“2025”).

Here’s a breakdown of what that likely means in the context of ETS2:

Understanding the Terms
Basculante (Dump Trailer/Tipper): This is a trailer designed to haul loose materials like sand, gravel, dirt, or grain, which can be unloaded by tilting the trailer body.

Estrada (Road/Highway): This simply indicates it’s a road-legal trailer.
Dolly: In trucking, a dolly is an unpowered axle assembly that converts a semi-trailer into a full trailer. It allows a semi-trailer to be pulled behind another truck or another full trailer, creating a “doubles” or “triples” configuration. This is common in some regions (like Australia, or certain parts of North America and Europe for specific applications).

2025: This suggests you’re looking for a very modern, possibly concept, or highly detailed and updated version of such a trailer.

Availability in ETS2
Official Game Content: As of the latest official updates (which introduced the Krone and Feldbinder trailer packs, and various other generic trailers), there isn’t an “official” basculante trailer with a dolly system in ETS2 from SCS Software. The standard dump trailers in the game are typically semi-trailers (connected directly to the truck’s fifth wheel).

Mods are Your Solution: To get a “Basculante Estrada Dolly 2025” in ETS2, you will almost certainly need to rely on community-created mods. Modders frequently create unique trailer configurations, including dolly setups, that aren’t present in the base game.

What to Look for in Mods
When searching for such a mod, here are some things to consider and keywords to use:
“Dump Trailer with Dolly ETS2”
“Tipper Trailer Dolly ETS2”
“Basculante Dolly ETS2” (if searching on Brazilian/Portuguese mod sites)
“Double Trailer ETS2” or “Triple Trailer ETS2” (these often include dolly configurations)
“Road Train ETS2” (while more common in ATS, some ETS2 mods simulate this for specific regions)

Modern or “Next-Gen” Trailers: Since you mentioned “2025,” look for mods that boast high detail, modern features, or specific models that look contemporary.

Credits: AM29

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
